DOC.criteria: Adult ( > 18 yr age ) Healthy Willingness give write informed consent Smoking > 5 cigarettes/day Diet > 2 portion fatty fish per day Use oral fish oil vitamin substrates History metabolic disorder ( especially diabetes lipid disorder ) History allergic , inflammatory immunological disease History pulmonary , cardiovascular , renal hematological disease Medication use
